tweet: I'm thankful @Surgeon_General is raising awareness about the harmful effects of cannabis on pregnant women and adolescents (up to age 25). There's a false perception that marijuana isn't dangerous, & we must educate the public about health hazards caused by recreational marijuana

.@realDonaldTrump understands the threats our nation faces. We’ve been complacent for too long while our near-peer adversaries (Russia & China) have closed the gap between our space capabilities. Peterson AFB is the best home for @US_SpaceCom. Great day for our space warfighters!

Today @POTUS and @VP will announce the temporary stand-up of U.S. Space Command in Colorado Springs at Peterson AFB. This is an important and exciting development for our space warfighters (& bad news for our adversaries). It is past time to reestablish our dominance in space.

We cannot remain shackled by a treaty while our near-peer adversaries attempt to surpass us. I am confident that @POTUS will renegotiate a better, modern arms control treaty. Treaties are tools of statecraft, & should be used to advance our interests, not hamper us. (2/2)

There cannot be a treaty when only one side complies. The U.S. has adhered to the confines of the INF treaty while the Russian government has continually spent years in violation. Russia has expanded and modernized its weapons arsenal, while China is not part of the deal. (1/2)

Child trafficking and child recycling are huge issues we face every day at our southern border. I commend @CBP for their diligent work in preventing the trafficking of the most vulnerable. I support the increased utilization of DNA testing in order to end this heinous crime. pic.twitter.com/6agkFSLnKn
